content: a marker at the bor k 1 p 1 until the ribbing measures 9 cm set-up round change to 5 0 mm needles knit all sts while placing markers as follows k 17 17 18 half back pm k 2 pm k 12 12 12 right sleeve pm k 2 pm k 34 35 37 front pm k 2 pm 12 12 12 left sleeve pm k 2 pm k to bor neck shaping the neck is shaped by using gsr the raglan increases are worked at the same  row 1 rs *k to next marker m1r rs sm k 2 sm m1l rs * repeat from * to * one more time k 3 3 3 make the gsr turn in the last knit stitch  row 2 ws p to bor sm when you pass them *p to marker m1r ws sm p 2 sm m1l ws * repeat from * to * one more time p 3 3 3 make the gsr turn in the last purled stitch  row 3 rs k to bor sm when you pass them *k to next marker m1r rs sm k2 sm m1l rs * repeat from * to * one more time k to last gsr turn k gsr turn as one stitch k 4 4 4 make the gsr turn in the last knit stitch  row 4 ws p to bor sm when you pass them *p to marker m1r ws sm p 2 sm m1l ws * repeat from * to * one more time p to last gsr turn p gsr turn as one stitch p 4 4 4 make the gsr turn in the last purled stitch repeat row 3 and 4 two more time you turned a total of 4 times on each side  row 9 rs k to bor there are 132 134 138 sts on the needles raglan increases continue working in the round while increasing every other round as follows  round 1 increase round *k to next marker m1r rs sm k 2 sm m1l rs * repeat from * to * three more times k to bor  round 2 k all sts slip markers when you pass them work round 1 and 2 a total of 24 25 27 times now there are a total of 324 334 354 sts on the needles 90 93 99 sts for the front same for the back 68 70 74 sts for each sleeve and 8 raglan sts now the work measures 32 3 33 2 34 8 cm from the cast-on edge at the back 5 separation of body and sleeves k to next marker slip or remove marker k 1 place next 70 72 76 sts on hold cast on 13 15 15 sts k 1 slip or remove marker k to next marker slip or remove marker k 1 place next 70 72 76 sts on hold cast on 13 15 15 sts k 1
